TITLE_PRESENT.label: Registration Documents Present?
TITLE_PRESENT.description: The Seller must announce if the vehicle Registration Certificate is present and in Sellers name.

ALL_KEYS_PRESENT.label: All Keys Are Present?
ALL_KEYS_PRESENT.description: The Seller must announce if all the original keys and fobs are present.

BOOKS_PRESENT.label: Are All Service, Warranty and Owner's Manual Present?
BOOKS_PRESENT.description: The Seller must announce if all the original books are present.

DISCS_PRESENT.label: All Software and Navigation Discs Are Present?
DISCS_PRESENT.description: The Seller must announce if all the original software and navigation discs are present.

RIMS_TYRES.label: If Aftermarket/Winter Tyres and Rims, Are Originals Included?
RIMS_TYRES.description: The Seller has the option to include the original rims and tyres that came with the vehicle

OTHER_ANNOUNCEMENTS.label: Any Other Announcements?
OTHER_ANNOUNCEMENTS.description: The Seller has the option to include additional information about the vehicle.
